content: I like the sound of amplifying the sound of the water feature using natural or decorative elements. I think placing a small, curved wall of stones behind the bubbler would be a great idea. I'm also considering adding some coastal sounds, like seagulls or ocean waves, in the background to create a more immersive experience. What are some other beach-inspired decorative elements I could incorporate into the patio and garden design to enhance the ambiance?
